data.message: I don't like udemy courses and the subject makes me angry of the course! 12 week online Programing c'mon! Go for @CodeSchool better.

First of all that's not Udemy. it's called "Coder Manual Interactive Bootcamp".
And you can see more details on their website: https://codermanual.com/
It really does cover a lot with 11 projects to add to your portfolio.
